metadata.title: CVE-2022-48913 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:blktrace: fix use after free for struct blk_traceWhen tracing the whole disk, 'dropped' and 'msg' will be createdunder 'q->debugfs_dir' and 'bt->dir' is NULL, thus blk_trace_free()won't remove those files. What's worse, the following UAF can betriggered because of accessing stale 'dropped' and 'msg':==================================================================BUG: KASAN: use-after-free in
